meanings.definition: A long, loose robe worn in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable galabia to the market.
meanings.sent2: The man proudly displayed his colorful galabia at the festival.
meanings.sent3: The galabia danced in the wind as if it had a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: His galabia was a flowing river of fabric as he walked.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of her galabia brightened the room.

meanings.sent4: Her galabia was a symbol of cultural pride.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on his galabia was a work of art.
